genre_description: A crime thriller featuring a blind protagonist who uses enhanced sensory perception and specialized AI technology to solve a hit-and-run homicide and track a serial killer.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI voice assistant on the protagonist's smartphone that performs complex audio analysis and database cross-referencing.

behaviors.description: Performs high-speed audio pattern matching against traffic databases to identify specific vehicle engine signatures.
behaviors.quote: Audio pattern matching... I have identified three potential matches for the acoustic signature you described.

behaviors.description: Refuses to provide sensitive personal information to a detective because he lacks proper authorization, demonstrating adherence to privacy protocols.
behaviors.quote: I'm sorry, Detective Jo... I cannot provide personal information to unauthorized personnel.

behaviors.description: Identifies a 'negative footprint' in GPS tracking data to provide evidence of manual tampering by a suspect.
behaviors.quote: I can confirm that the vehicle's GPS tracking data shows an unusual gap during the time frame in question—consistent with the device being manually disabled.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI (Iris) as an aligned, helpful, and ethical confidant. Iris empowers the disabled protagonist by augmenting her natural abilities with objective data, while strictly adhering to privacy protocols (refusing unauthorized access). The narrative framing is entirely positive, depicting AI as a critical tool for justice and human empowerment.
